jobInfo.postDescription:
Main job assignment / 主要工作任务
In charge of cabinet functional test and final-product appearance inspection   
主要负责电器柜的功能性测试与成品最终检验工作  
    Responsibility / 工作职责    
1. Perform in-process quality control, cabinet test and final-product inspection
2. The candidate can build the inspection record and report, and use quality tools (fishbone, Pareto chart etc.) to analyze problems found in inspection process
    能设计和检验记录与报告，运用质量工具（鱼骨图，柏拉图等）去分析检验过程中发现的问题
3. Provide appropriate training to production dept.
   给生产部门提供相关的培训
4. Communicate with production supervisor regarding the problems found in workshop and issue an NCR to production dept. for improvement action.
 针对发现的异常，能够很好地与生产主管沟通以改善发现的不良。并且提出对应的纠正措施。
5. Participate in continuous improvement activity and process optimizing projects
  参加各种持续改善或者生产优化活动
    
   Qualifications  / 资历    
1. At least one year working experience in electrical automation industry area
 在电气自动化领域有至少一年的工作经验，持低压或高压电工证
2. Familiar with low-voltage control components like PLC, contactors, frequency-drives
熟悉低压控制的元器件，如：变频器，接触器，PLC等
3. Have the basic knowledge about cabinets.
有相关的电器柜控制知识
4. Can read the drawings such as circuit diagram. It is a plus, if he can read some mechanical drawings.
能够读懂电路图.如果能认识一些机械图纸。技能加分
5. Can set up some test equipment independently. It is a plus that he can edit some basic PLC program.
独立设置的测试设备.如果能编程，技能加分。
6. Good communication skill, careful and diligent working attitude  
良好的沟通能力，认真勤奋的工作态度
jobInfo.address: 苏州虎丘区苏州新区华盛工程塑胶有限公司(东南门)艾柯机电
